title: 地皮插件如何设置一块皮多少游戏币

txt_content:

           怎么设置啊。。。 求大神！！

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
economy:
      UseEconomy: false
      CanPutOnSale: false
      CanSellToBank: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
      ClaimPrice: 0.0
      ClearPrice: 0.0
      AddPlayerPrice: 0.0
      DenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      RemovePlayerPrice: 0.0
      UndenyPlayerPrice: 0.0
      PlotHomePrice: 0.0
      CanCustomizeSellPrice: false
      SellToPlayerPrice: 0.0
      SellToBankPrice: 0.0
      BuyFromBankPrice: 0.0
      AddCommentPrice: 0.0
      BiomeChangePrice: 0.0
      ProtectPrice: 0.0
      DisposePrice: 0.0

先找到 RefundClaimPriceOnReset: false
      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
将他改为 true 
然后再改       ClaimPrice: 0.0
才有效 

望采纳

replies.txt_content:

      RefundClaimPriceOnSetOwner: false
      ClaimPrice: 0.0   -------- 这个数字改成要的价钱
